ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the night when it travels on,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the night when it departs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and by the night when it moves on towards daybreak (reward and retribution in the next life is an absolute reality).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the night when it recedes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And by the night when it departs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the night when it departs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: by the night when it journeys on!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the night when it departeth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And by the night when it departeth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the night when it departs!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by the Night when it passeth away;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the night when it departs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the night when it journeys on!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the night as it recedes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the night when it passes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:4] and [by] the night in motion, falling or receding:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the night when it departeth) this refers to the night of Muzdalifah; it is also said this means: the night in which people come and go; Allah swore by all these things that: your Lord, Muhammad, is ever Watchful. He says:
